Attribute id is responded to by parameter CommitStatus with a description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user
Attribute name is responded to by parameter CommitStatus with a description: Filter by job name, e.g., bundler:audit
Attribute ref is responded to by parameter CommitStatus with a description: The name of a repository branch or tag or, if not given, the default branch

Attribute allow_merge_on_skipped_pipeline is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Set whether or not merge requests can be merged with skipped jobs
Attribute auto_devops_deploy_strategy is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Auto Deploy strategy
Attribute auto_devops_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Enable Auto DevOps for this project
Attribute autoclose_referenced_issues is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Set whether auto-closing referenced issues on default branch

Attribute container_registry_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Enable container registry for this project
{"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
Attribute default_branch is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: master by default
Attribute description is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Short project description
{"type": "string"}
Attribute issues_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: (Deprecated)Enable issues for this project. Use issues_access_level instead
Attribute jobs_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: (Deprecated)Enable jobs for this project. Use builds_access_level instead
{"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
{"type": "string", "format": "date"}
Attribute merge_method is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Set the merge method used
Attribute merge_requests_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: (Deprecated)Enable merge requests for this project. Use merge_requests_access_level instead
Attribute name is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: The name of the new project. Either path or name is required, not both

Attribute only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_resolved is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Set whether merge requests can only be merged when all the discussions are resolved
Attribute only_allow_merge_if_pipeline_succeeds is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Set whether merge requests can only be merged with successful jobs
{"type": "string", "format": "date-time"}
Attribute packages_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Enable or disable packages repository feature
Attribute path is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Repository name for new project. Generated based on name if not provided (generated as lowercase with dashes)
Attribute public_builds is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: If true, jobs can be viewed by non-project members
{"type": "string"}
Attribute remove_source_branch_after_merge is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Enable Delete source branch option by default for all new merge requests
Attribute repository_storage is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Which storage shard the repository is on.(admins only)
Attribute request_access_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Allow users to request member access
Attribute resolve_outdated_diff_discussions is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Automatically resolve merge request diffs discussions on lines changed with a push
Attribute shared_runners_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: Enable shared runners for this project
Attribute snippets_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: (Deprecated)Enable snippets for this project. Use snippets_access_level instead
Attribute tag_list is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: The list of tags for a project; put array of tags, that should be finally assigned to a project
Attribute visibility is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: See project visibility level
{"type": "string"}
Attribute wiki_enabled is responded to by parameter BasicProjectDetails with a description: (Deprecated)Enable wiki for this project. Use wiki_access_levelinstead
